title: How to verify?
subtitle: Explore workflows and tools for verification.
mobileDescription: A knowledge graph on verification tools.
mobileAlert: To use this website properly please use a desktop device.
selectMediaType: Select a media type you want to investigate

introText:
Learn about verification workflows and tools by exploring this website.

Start with the type of digital media you want to verify and work your way down the verification workflows to the tools that can help you. 

DW's team for the KID2 project has gathered its verification experience in an interactive knowledge graph. Key sources for this knowledge graph are our colleague Julia Bayer, Sector035, Quiztime, Bellingcat, First Draft, The Verification Handbook and members of the OSINT community.

If you also have valuable verification workflows and tools to share or if you miss your favourite tool, please let us know via the feedback form.

This website has been created by [DW Innovation](https://innovation.dw.com/) and is co-funded by the German Secretary of State for Culture and the Media ([BKM](https://www.bundesregierung.de/breg-de/bundesregierung/staatsministerin-fuer-kultur-und-medien)) via the KID2 Project.
